verses.verse: ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Woe בָּנִ֤ים <WH1121> children סֽוֹרְרִים֙ <WH5637> to the rebellious נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <WH6213> that take עֵצָה֙ <WH6098> counsel וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not מִנִּ֔י <WH4480> Mine וְלִנְסֹ֥ךְ <WH5258> but not of me and that cover מַסֵּכָ֖ה <WH4541> with a covering וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not רוּחִ֑י <WH7307> but not of my spirit לְמַ֛עַן <WH4616> order סְפ֥וֹת <WH5595> that they may add חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> sin עַל־ <WH5921> unto חַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> to sin

הַהֹלְכִים֙ <WH1980> That walk לָרֶ֣דֶת <WH3381> to go down מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> into Egypt וּפִ֖י <WH6310> at my mouth לֹ֣א <WH3808> Without שָׁאָ֑לוּ <WH7592> and have not asked לָעוֹז֙ <WH5810> to strengthen בְּמָע֣וֹז <WH4581> themselves in the strength פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh וְלַחְס֖וֹת <WH2620> and to trust בְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> in the shadow מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֛ם מָע֥וֹז <WH4581> Therefore shall the strength פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh לְבֹ֑שֶׁת <WH1322> be your shame וְהֶחָס֥וּת <WH2622> and the trust בְּצֵל־ <WH6738> in the shadow מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לִכְלִמָּֽה׃ <WH3639> [your] confusion

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָי֥וּ <WH1961> are at בְצֹ֖עַן <WH6814> were at Zoan שָׂרָ֑יו <WH8269> For his princes וּמַלְאָכָ֖יו <WH4397> and his ambassadors חָנֵ֥ס <WH2609> to Hanes יַגִּֽיעוּ׃ <WH5060> came

כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> Everyone [הִבְאִישׁ כ] (הֹבִ֔ישׁ <WH887> loathsome ק) עַל־ <WH5921> because עַ֖ם <WH5971> of a people לֹא־ <WH3808> cannot יוֹעִ֣ילוּ <WH3276> [that] could not profit לָ֑מוֹ לֹ֤א <WH3808> cannot לְעֵ֙זֶר֙ <WH5828> them nor be an help וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot לְהוֹעִ֔יל <WH3276> nor profit כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לְבֹ֖שֶׁת <WH1322> but a shame וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also לְחֶרְפָּֽה׃ <WH2781> and also a reproach ס

מַשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> The burden בַּהֲמ֣וֹת <WH929> of the beasts נֶ֑גֶב <WH5045> of the south בְּאֶרֶץ֩ <WH776> into the land צָרָ֨ה <WH6869> of trouble וְצוּקָ֜ה <WH6695> and anguish לָבִ֧יא <WH3833> from whence [come] the young וָלַ֣יִשׁ <WH3918> and old lion מֵהֶ֗ם <WH1992> where אֶפְעֶה֙ <WH660> the viper וְשָׂרָ֣ף <WH8314> serpent מְעוֹפֵ֔ף <WH5774> flying יִשְׂאוּ֩ <WH5375> they will carry עַל־ <WH5921> on כֶּ֨תֶף <WH3802> upon the shoulders עֲיָרִ֜ים <WH5895> of young asses חֵֽילֵהֶ֗ם <WH2428> their riches וְעַל־ <WH5921> and דַּבֶּ֤שֶׁת <WH1707> upon the bunches גְּמַלִּים֙ <WH1581> of camels אֽוֹצְרֹתָ֔ם <WH214> and their treasures עַל־ <WH5921> unto עַ֖ם <WH5971> to a people לֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot יוֹעִֽילוּ׃ <WH3276> [that] shall not profit

וּמִצְרַ֕יִם <WH4714> For the Egyptians הֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> in vain וָרִ֖יק <WH7385> and to no purpose יַעְזֹ֑רוּ <WH5826> shall help לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> Therefore קָרָ֣אתִי <WH7121> therefore have I cried לָזֹ֔את <WH2063> concerning this רַ֥הַב <WH7293> strength הֵ֖ם <WH1992> Their שָֽׁבֶת׃ <WH7674> [is] to sit still

עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now בּ֣וֹא <WH935> Now go כָתְבָ֥הּ <WH3789> write עַל־ <WH5921> on ל֛וּחַ <WH3871> it before them in a table אִתָּ֖ם <WH854> before וְעַל־ <WH5921> on סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> it in a book חֻקָּ֑הּ <WH2710> and note וּתְהִי֙ <WH1961> may serve לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> that it may be for the time אַחֲר֔וֹן <WH314> to come לָעַ֖ד <WH5707> witness עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> and ever

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עַ֤ם <WH5971> people מְרִי֙ <WH4805> That this [is] a rebellious ה֔וּא <WH1931> this בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> children כֶּחָשִׁ֑ים <WH3586> lying בָּנִ֕ים <WH1121> children לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אָב֥וּ <WH14> [that] will שְׁמ֖וֹעַ <WH8085> not hear תּוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> the law יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> Who אָמְר֤וּ <WH559> Which say לָֽרֹאִים֙ <WH7200> to the seers לֹ֣א <WH3808> must not תִרְא֔וּ <WH7200> See וְלַ֣חֹזִ֔ים <WH2374> not and to the prophets לֹ֥א <WH3808> must not תֶחֱזוּ־ <WH2372> Prophesy לָ֖נוּ נְכֹח֑וֹת <WH5229> not unto us right things דַּבְּרוּ־ <WH1696> speak לָ֣נוּ חֲלָק֔וֹת <WH2513> unto us smooth things חֲז֖וּ <WH4123> deceits מַהֲתַלּֽוֹת׃ <WH2372> prophesy

ס֚וּרוּ <WH5493> Get you out מִנֵּי־ <WH4480> out דֶ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> of the way הַטּ֖וּ <WH5186> turn aside מִנֵּי־ <WH4480> from אֹ֑רַח <WH734> out of the path הַשְׁבִּ֥יתוּ <WH7673> to cease מִפָּנֵ֖ינוּ <WH6440> from before אֶת־ <WH853> קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> cause the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Wherefore thus saith קְד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel יַ֥עַן <WH3282> Since מָֽאָסְכֶ֖ם <WH3988> Because ye despise בַּדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this word הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַֽתִּבְטְחוּ֙ <WH982> and trust בְּעֹ֣שֶׁק <WH6233> in oppression וְנָל֔וֹז <WH3868> and perverseness וַתִּֽשָּׁעֲנ֖וּ <WH8172> and stay עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become לָכֶם֙ הֶעָוֹ֣ן <WH5771> Therefore this iniquity הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this כְּפֶ֣רֶץ <WH6556> shall be to you as a breach נֹפֵ֔ל <WH5307> ready to fall נִבְעֶ֖ה <WH1158> swelling out בְּחוֹמָ֣ה <WH2346> wall נִשְׂגָּבָ֑ה <WH7682> in a high אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Whose פִּתְאֹ֥ם <WH6597> suddenly לְפֶ֖תַע <WH6621> at an instant יָב֥וֹא <WH935> cometh שִׁבְרָֽהּ׃ <WH7667> whose breaking

וּ֠שְׁבָרָהּ <WH7665> And he shall break כְּשֵׁ֨בֶר <WH7667> it as the breaking נֵ֧בֶל <WH5035> vessel יוֹצְרִ֛ים <WH3335> of the potters' כָּת֖וּת <WH3807> that is broken in pieces לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יַחְמֹ֑ל <WH2550> he shall not spare וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִמָּצֵ֤א <WH4672> so that there shall not be found בִמְכִתָּתוֹ֙ <WH4386> in the bursting חֶ֔רֶשׂ <WH2789> of it a sherd לַחְתּ֥וֹת <WH2846> to take אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> fire מִיָּק֔וּד <WH3344> from the hearth וְלַחְשֹׂ֥ף <WH2834> or to take מַ֖יִם <WH4325> water מִגֶּֽבֶא׃ <WH1360> [withal] out of the pit פ

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַר֩ <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֨י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֜ה <WH3069> GOD קְד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּשׁוּבָ֤ה <WH7729> In returning וָנַ֙חַת֙ <WH5183> and rest תִּוָּ֣שֵׁע֔וּן <WH3467> shall ye be saved בְּהַשְׁקֵט֙ <WH8252> in quietness וּבְבִטְחָ֔ה <WH985> and in confidence תִּֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become גְּבֽוּרַתְכֶ֑ם <WH1369> shall be your strength וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> were not אֲבִיתֶֽם׃ <WH14> and ye would

וַתֹּ֨אמְר֥וּ <WH559> But ye said לֹא־ <WH3808> No כִ֛י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> on ס֥וּס <WH5483> upon horses נָנ֖וּס <WH5127> No for we will flee עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> after that תְּנוּס֑וּן <WH5127> therefore shall ye flee וְעַל־ <WH5921> on קַ֣ל <WH7031> upon the swift נִרְכָּ֔ב <WH7392> and We will ride עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that יִקַּ֥לּוּ <WH7043> you be swift רֹדְפֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH7291> therefore shall they that pursue

אֶ֣לֶף <WH505> thousand אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> One מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> [shall flee] at גַּעֲרַ֣ת <WH1606> the rebuke אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> of one מִפְּנֵ֛י <WH6440> at גַּעֲרַ֥ת <WH1606> the rebuke חֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> of five תָּנֻ֑סוּ <WH5127> shall ye flee עַ֣ד <WH5704> against אִם־ <WH518> lo נוֹתַרְתֶּ֗ם <WH3498> till ye be left כַּתֹּ֙רֶן֙ <WH8650> as a beacon עַל־ <WH5921> and רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> upon the top הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> of a mountain וְכַנֵּ֖ס <WH5251> and as an ensign עַל־ <WH5921> on הַגִּבְעָֽה׃ <WH1389> on an hill

וְלָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore יְחַכֶּ֤ה <WH2442> wait יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And therefore will the LORD לַֽחֲנַנְכֶ֔ם <WH2603> that he may be gracious וְלָכֵ֥ן <WH3651> and therefore יָר֖וּם <WH7311> unto you and therefore will he be exalted לְרַֽחֶמְכֶ֑ם <WH7355> that he may have mercy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> is a אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> [is] a God מִשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> of judgment יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> upon you for the LORD אַשְׁרֵ֖י <WH835> blessed כָּל־ <WH3605> are all ח֥וֹכֵי <WH2442> [are] all they that wait לֽוֹ׃ ס

כִּי־ <WH3588> O עַ֛ם <WH5971> For the people בְּצִיּ֥וֹן <WH6726> in Zion יֵשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> shall dwell בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem בָּכ֣וֹ <WH1058> thou shalt weep לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תִבְכֶּ֗ה <WH1058> no more חָנ֤וֹן <WH2603> he will be very יָחְנְךָ֙ <WH2603> gracious לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> unto thee at the voice זַעֲקֶ֔ךָ <WH2201> cry כְּשָׁמְעָת֖וֹ <WH8085> when he shall hear עָנָֽךְ׃ <WH6030> it he will answer

וְנָתַ֨ן <WH5414> give לָכֶ֧ם אֲדֹנָ֛י <WH136> And [though] the Lord לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> you the bread צָ֖ר <WH6862> of adversity וּמַ֣יִם <WH4325> and the water לָ֑חַץ <WH3906> of affliction וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will no יִכָּנֵ֥ף <WH3670> be removed into a corner עוֹד֙ <WH5750> longer מוֹרֶ֔יךָ <WH3384> yet shall not thy teachers וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become עֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> any more but thine eyes רֹא֥וֹת <WH7200> shall see אֶת־ <WH853> מוֹרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3384> thy teachers

וְאָזְנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH241> And thine ears תִּשְׁמַ֣עְנָה <WH8085> shall hear דָבָ֔ר <WH1697> a word מֵֽאַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <WH310> behind לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> thee saying זֶ֤ה <WH2088> This הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> This [is] the way לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> walk ב֔וֹ כִּ֥י <WH3588> whenever תַאֲמִ֖ינוּ <WH541> when ye turn to the right hand וְכִ֥י <WH3588> whenever תַשְׂמְאִֽילוּ׃ <WH8041> and when ye turn to the left

וְטִמֵּאתֶ֗ם <WH2930> Ye shall defile אֶת־ <WH853> צִפּוּי֙ <WH6826> also the covering פְּסִילֵ֣י <WH6456> of thy graven images כַסְפֶּ֔ךָ <WH3701> of silver וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲפֻדַּ֖ת <WH642> and the ornament מַסֵּכַ֣ת <WH4541> of thy molten images זְהָבֶ֑ךָ <WH2091> of gold תִּזְרֵם֙ <WH2219> thou shalt cast them away כְּמ֣וֹ <WH3644> as דָוָ֔ה <WH1739> as a menstruous cloth צֵ֖א <WH3318> unto it Get thee hence תֹּ֥אמַר <WH559> thou shalt say לֽוֹ׃

וְנָתַן֩ <WH5414> Then shall he give מְטַ֨ר <WH4306> the rain זַרְעֲךָ֜ <WH2233> of thy seed אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תִּזְרַ֣ע <WH2232> that thou shalt sow אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲדָמָ֗ה <WH127> the ground וְלֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> withal and bread תְּבוּאַ֣ת <WH8393> of the increase הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> of the earth וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become דָשֵׁ֖ן <WH1879> and it shall be fat וְשָׁמֵ֑ן <WH8082> and plenteous יִרְעֶ֥ה <WH7462> feed מִקְנֶ֛יךָ <WH4735> shall thy cattle בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he כַּ֥ר <WH3733> pastures נִרְחָֽב׃ <WH7337> in large

וְהָאֲלָפִ֣ים <WH504> The oxen וְהָעֲיָרִ֗ים <WH5895> likewise and the young asses עֹֽבְדֵי֙ <WH5647> that ear הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> the ground בְּלִ֥יל <WH1098> provender חָמִ֖יץ <WH2548> clean יֹאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> shall eat אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which זֹרֶ֥ה <WH2219> which hath been winnowed בָרַ֖חַת <WH7371> with the shovel וּבַמִּזְרֶֽה׃ <WH4214> and with the fan

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַ֣ר <WH2022> mountain גָּבֹ֗הַ <WH1364> And there shall be upon every high וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and on כָּל־ <WH3605> every גִּבְעָ֣ה <WH1389> hill נִשָּׂאָ֔ה <WH5375> and upon every high פְּלָגִ֖ים <WH6388> rivers יִבְלֵי־ <WH2988> [and] streams מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of waters בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> in the day הֶ֣רֶג <WH2027> slaughter רָ֔ב <WH7227> of the great בִּנְפֹ֖ל <WH5307> fall מִגְדָּלִֽים׃ <WH4026> when the towers

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become אוֹר־ <WH216> Moreover the light הַלְּבָנָה֙ <WH3842> of the moon כְּא֣וֹר <WH216> shall be as the light הַֽחַמָּ֔ה <WH2535> of the sun וְא֤וֹר <WH216> and the light הַֽחַמָּה֙ <WH2535> of the sun יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become שִׁבְעָתַ֔יִם <WH7659> shall be sevenfold כְּא֖וֹר <WH216> as the light שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> of seven הַיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> days בְּי֗וֹם <WH3117> in the day חֲבֹ֤שׁ <WH2280> bindeth up יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> שֶׁ֣בֶר <WH7667> the breach עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> of his people וּמַ֥חַץ <WH4273> the stroke מַכָּת֖וֹ <WH4347> of their wound יִרְפָּֽא׃ <WH7495> and healeth ס

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold שֵׁם־ <WH8034> Behold the name יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בָּ֣א <WH935> cometh מִמֶּרְחָ֔ק <WH4801> from far בֹּעֵ֣ר <WH1197> burning אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> [with] his anger וְכֹ֖בֶד <WH3514> [thereof is] heavy מַשָּׂאָ֑ה <WH4858> and the burden שְׂפָתָיו֙ <WH8193> his lips מָ֣לְאוּ <WH4390> are full זַ֔עַם <WH2195> of indignation וּלְשׁוֹנ֖וֹ <WH3956> and his tongue כְּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> fire אֹכָֽלֶת׃ <WH398> as a devouring

וְרוּח֞וֹ <WH7307> And his breath כְּנַ֤חַל <WH5158> stream שׁוֹטֵף֙ <WH7857> as an overflowing עַד־ <WH5704> against צַוָּ֣אר <WH6677> of the neck יֶֽחֱצֶ֔ה <WH2673> shall reach to the midst לַהֲנָפָ֥ה <WH5130> to sift גוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> the nations בְּנָ֣פַת <WH5299> with the sieve שָׁ֑וְא <WH7723> of vanity וְרֶ֣סֶן <WH7448> and [there shall be] a bridle מַתְעֶ֔ה <WH8582> causing [them] to err עַ֖ל <WH5921> and to in לְחָיֵ֥י <WH3895> in the jaws עַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> of the people

הַשִּׁיר֙ <WH7892> Ye shall have a song יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will have לָכֶ֔ם כְּלֵ֖יל <WH3915> as in the night הִתְקַדֶּשׁ־ <WH6942> is kept חָ֑ג <WH2282> solemnity וְשִׂמְחַ֣ת <WH8057> and gladness לֵבָ֗ב <WH3824> of heart כַּֽהוֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> as when one goeth בֶּֽחָלִ֔יל <WH2485> with a pipe לָב֥וֹא <WH935> to come בְהַר־ <WH2022> into the mountain יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to צ֥וּר <WH6697> to the mighty One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְהִשְׁמִ֨יעַ <WH8085> to be heard יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ה֣וֹד <WH1935> shall cause his glorious קוֹל֗וֹ <WH6963> voice וְנַ֤חַת <WH5183> the lighting down זְרוֹעוֹ֙ <WH2220> of his arm יַרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> and shall shew בְּזַ֣עַף <WH2197> with the indignation אַ֔ף <WH639> of [his] anger וְלַ֖הַב <WH3851> and [with] the flame אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> fire אוֹכֵלָ֑ה <WH398> of a devouring נֶ֥פֶץ <WH5311> [with] scattering וָזֶ֖רֶם <WH2230> and tempest וְאֶ֥בֶן <WH68> stones בָּרָֽד׃ <WH1259> hail

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> at מִקּ֥וֹל <WH6963> For through the voice יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יֵחַ֣ת <WH2865> be beaten down אַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> shall the Assyrian בַּשֵּׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> with a rod יַכֶּֽה׃ <WH5221> [which] smote

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become כֹּ֤ל <WH3605> And [in] every place מַֽעֲבַר֙ <WH4569> shall pass מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> staff מֽוּסָדָ֔ה <WH4145> where the grounded אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> Which יָנִ֤יחַ <WH5117> shall lay יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> on בְּתֻפִּ֖ים <WH8596> upon him [it] shall be with tabrets וּבְכִנֹּר֑וֹת <WH3658> and harps וּבְמִלְחֲמ֥וֹת <WH4421> and in battles תְּנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> of shaking נִלְחַם־ <WH3898> will he fight [בָּהּ כ] (בָּֽם׃ ק)

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָר֤וּךְ <WH6186> [is] ordained מֵֽאֶתְמוּל֙ <WH865> of old תָּפְתֶּ֔ה <WH8613> For Tophet גַּם־ <WH1571> Indeed [הוּא כ] (הִ֛יא <WH1931> he ק) לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> yea for the king הוּכָ֖ן <WH3559> it is prepared הֶעְמִ֣יק <WH6009> he hath made [it] deep הִרְחִ֑ב <WH7337> [and] large מְדֻרָתָ֗הּ <WH4071> the pile אֵ֤שׁ <WH784> thereof [is] fire וְעֵצִים֙ <WH6086> wood הַרְבֵּ֔ה <WH7235> and much נִשְׁמַ֤ת <WH5397> the breath יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD כְּנַ֣חַל <WH5158> like a stream גָּפְרִ֔ית <WH1614> of brimstone בֹּעֲרָ֖ה <WH1197> doth kindle בָּֽהּ׃ ס
